        public Weapon(java.lang.String name,
      int value,
      int encumberance,
      double strengthMod,
      int dmgUpperBound,
      int dmgLowerBound)
        Creates a new Weapon object that is a subclass of Swag
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the weapon
        value - the value of the weapon
        encumberance - how much the weapon 'weighs'
        strengthMod - the strength modifier the weapon gives
        dmgUpperBound - the upper bound of the damage this weapon deals
        dmgLowerBound - the lower bound of the damage this weapon deals
